title: Does Kristin's Husband Trust Her Alone With Their Son?
description:
Kristin knows her husband is exhausted being a stay-at-home dad. Because of this, she wants to give him a break for a weekend. So she asked her husband if he trusted her alone with their son. What was his response? Listen!
